entry.source: This is Hope. A nearby village appears to be{F801}having an outbreak of a fatal disease that{F801}turns one's body pitch-black. However, this{F801}is not a disease, but a curse, caused by the{F801}dancing of a group of Macabre spirits on{F801}the {F804,5}third level of Naraku.{F804,0} {F804,5}Eliminate them.{F804,0}{F801}
